text: Operazione N.A.S. is an Italian crime television series that premiered on NOVE on February 11, 2018. The series is written by Gregorio Paolini and Carla Mellidi. It is produced by Fabio Gallera and Hangar. The series is dedicated to operations of Nuclei Antisofisticazioni e Sanità of the Italian Arm of Carabinieri. Episodes in the second season follow investigations in Rome, Caserta, Florence, Latina, Naples and Pescara. ==Episodes== {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" |Season ! rowspan="2" |Episodes ! colspan="2" |Originally aired |- !First aired !Last aired |- |1 |21 |February 11, 2018 |March 12, 2018 |- |2 |40 |September 3, 2018 |October 26, 2018 |} ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Category:Italian crime television series
title: Operazione N.A.S.
